main event: A glowing reddish object was sighted north of Midway Island on an east-bound course, tracked for approximately 10 minutes covering 40 degrees of arc.
interesting points: The object was tracked by ground radar.
No aircraft was found to be in the area at the time of the sighting.
The object's altitude, size, and speed could not be estimated.
The report notes that a satellite would have been visible in the area at the time of the sighting.
The report states that no evaluation of the sighting has been made at this time.
